About

Cocoa Beans is a small software development and consultancy studio. We like to think we're building software that people love and enjoy using.

Gianluca Tranchedone

Founder & Software Craftsman

Gianluca has been crafting software for Apple devices since 2009. He recently got also into back and front-end development in Ruby on Rails.

We are craftsman and artists. We value honestly and consider our work as a mix of art and science. We only use the latest and greatest technology and the best practices for software development and design.
